languages.text: "Когда-то бы тебя лишили Истинной плоти за такие речи. Благословен будь тот день, когда Фабрикатор-Цензор избрал нас для нового пути!"
"Before, such words would have seen the True Flesh stripped from you. Blessed be the day when the Fabricator-Censor chose us to accompany him on the new path!"
languages.original_text: "Когда-то бы тебя лишили Истинной плоти за такие речи. Благословен будь тот день, когда Фабрикатор-Цензор избрал нас для нового пути!"

traits.locale_text: "Such words would have the True Flesh stripped from you before. Blessed be the day when Fabricator chose us to accompany him on the new path!"
"Such words would have the True Flesh stripped from you before. Blessed be the day when Fabricator chose us to accompany him on the new path!"
"Before, such words would have seen the True Flesh stripped from you. Blessed be the day when the Fabricator chose us to accompany him on the new path!"
"Before, such words would have seen the True Flesh stripped from you. Blessed be the day when the Fabricator chose us to accompany him on the new path!"
"Before, such words would have seen the True Flesh stripped from you. Blessed be the day when the Fabricator-Censor chose us to accompany him on the new path!"

languages.text: “若是以前，光是说出这样的话，就会导致你的实肉遭到剥夺。所幸，铸造审查师选择了我们，带领我们一起走上了全新的道路。”
languages.original_text: "Before, such words would have seen the True Flesh stripped from you. Blessed be the day when the Fabricator-Censor chose us to accompany him on the new path!"

traits.locale_text: “若是以前，光是说出这样的话，就会导致你的实肉遭到剥夺。所幸，铸造审查师选择了我们，带领我们一起走上了全新的道路。”

languages.text: «Anteriormente, por esas palabras se te habría arrancado la carne verdadera. ¡Alabado sea el día en que el fabricator-censor nos eligió para que lo acompañáramos en este nuevo camino!».
languages.original_text: "Before, such words would have seen the True Flesh stripped from you. Blessed be the day when the Fabricator-Censor chose us to accompany him on the new path!"

traits.locale_text: «Anteriormente, por esas palabras se te habría arrancado la carne verdadera. ¡Alabado sea el día en que el fabricator-censor nos eligió para que lo acompañáramos en este nuevo camino!».

languages.text: 「少し前にそんな発言をすれば、お前は体から真の肉を剥ぎ取られていただろう。ファブリケーター・センサーが我々を連れて、新たな道を歩まれた日に祝福を！」
languages.original_text: "Before, such words would have seen the True Flesh stripped from you. Blessed be the day when the Fabricator-Censor chose us to accompany him on the new path!"

traits.locale_text: 「少し前にそんな発言をすれば、お前は体から真の肉を剥ぎ取られていただろう。ファブリケーター・センサーが我々を連れて、新たな道を歩まれた日に祝福を！」

languages.text: "Früher wäre Euch für solche Worte das Wahre Fleisch vom Leib gerissen werden. Gesegnet sei der Tag, an dem der Fabrikator-Zensor uns als seine Begleiter auf dem neuen Pfad auswählte!"
languages.original_text: "Before, such words would have seen the True Flesh stripped from you. Blessed be the day when the Fabricator-Censor chose us to accompany him on the new path!"

traits.locale_text: "Früher wäre Euch für solche Worte das Wahre Fleisch vom Leib gerissen werden. Gesegnet sei der Tag, an dem der Fabrikator-Zensor uns als seine Begleiter auf dem neuen Pfad auswählte!"

languages.text: « Il fut un temps où ces propos vous auraient valu d'être séparée de votre chair véritable. Béni soit le jour où le fabricator-censeur nous a choisis pour l'accompagner sur cette nouvelle voie ! »
languages.original_text: "Before, such words would have seen the True Flesh stripped from you. Blessed be the day when the Fabricator-Censor chose us to accompany him on the new path!"

traits.locale_text: « Il fut un temps où ces propos vous auraient valu d'être séparée de votre chair véritable. Béni soit le jour où le fabricator-censeur nous a choisis pour l'accompagner sur cette nouvelle voie ! »

languages.text: "Önceden olsa bu cümleleri sarf ettiğin için Salt Suret'ten arındırıldın. Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün, yeni yolunda bizi eşlikçisi seçtiği güne şükürler olsun!"
languages.original_text: "Before, such words would have seen the True Flesh stripped from you. Blessed be the day when the Fabricator-Censor chose us to accompany him on the new path!"

traits.locale_text: "Önceden olsa bu cümleleri sarf ettiğin için Salt Suret'ten arındırıldın. Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün, yeni yolunda eşlik etmemiz için bizi seçtiği güne şükürler olsun!"
